children.subject: Hello, I was wondering if there are any updates on this. How many courses is a double major allowed to overlap with CS minor coursework? Just wondering because the CS classes I had planned for spring are unlikely to be offered.

history.content: Could someone provide me with guidance about how to declare a CS minor if I am already a declared double major? All the information I could find online included references for a single major. This included getting a sign off from a major advisor and comparing overlap from classes. I know the L&S changed their overlap policies recently, so I am a bit confused about the new process. Thank you.
history.subject: CS minor with double major
